name: French in a Flash: Marseilles-Style Spicy Clams and Mussels
description: This clam and mussel-based seafood stew is flavored with pastis, saffron, garlic, and chili flakes.

recipeInstructions.text: In a wide risotto pan, heat the olive oil over medium to medium-low heat and add the shallots, garlic, fennel, and chili flakes. Sauté until translucent, fragrant, and tender—about 5 minutes.
Add the tomatoes, and sauté another 3 minutes.
Add the saffron, the mussels, and the clams, and raise the heat to high. Cover, and steam the seafood until it opens—about 5 minutes. Shake in the cold butter to make the sauce creamy.
Toss in the fennel fronds and chervil and serve immediately.
